explains: adj. （某区域）无树木的；明显的，鲜明的；明确的，肯定的
v. 砍尽（某区域）的树木

sentences.en: There is no clear-cut answer to this question.
sentences.cn: 这个问题没有确切的答案。

sentences.en: This was a clear-cut case of the original land owner being in the right.
sentences.cn: 这是一起明显的原土地所有者有理的案件。

sentences.en: Past assessments of the Brazilian rain forest have used satellite images to tally deforested areas, where farmers and ranchers have clear-cut and burned all the trees.
sentences.cn: 对巴西雨林过去的评估已使用卫星图像来记录被砍伐的地区，那里的农民和牧场主把所有的树都砍光并烧掉了。
